title: Rune Classic
notes: Sound crackles from time to time and has some positional issues. Otherwise game runs flawlessly once you select D3D renderer (default is software).

title: Rune Classic
notes: Mouse jitters around in menu. Crash when changing video settings.
Use settings wizard (can be started from game menu), select defaults, and it will work perfectly.
